channel.title: Cant figure out how to fix this error
channel.description:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) Starting special edition PimpScape BETA (C) KillaMess, Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [/code]
[code] client.java:18682: operator && cannot be applied to int,int if(absY = 3712 && absY = 3970) ^ client.java:18682: incompatible types found : int required: boolean if(absY = 3712 && absY = 3970) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
ok, the first one appears in my runserver, the second in my compiler, please help

boolean is right, but i had the first error, but i completely forgot what to do, lol.
